message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40, with me getting the larger share. This seems like a good starting point for a fair negotiation.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about a 55/45 split?  It's a good deal considering the money loses value fast.
Let's be reasonable. After two rounds, I'm willing to meet you in the middle with an even split.  We can't keep going back and forth, or the value of the money will be gone!
